app_text.title: twitto.be
app_text.subtitle: real time dashboard of Belgian tweets
app_text.about: Twitto.be is a live dashboard providing analytics about the tweets geolocated in Belgium. The data you're seeing is what is happening right now on twitter, it's real real-time.

app_meta.title: Twitto.be - realtime tweets dashboard
app_meta.description: Twitto.be is a live dashboard providing analytics about the tweets geolocated in Belgium. Curious about what's being tweeted right now? Come have a look
